props.sectionTwoContent: Please note that our farm is only accessible with a reservation. Our farm-to-table restaurant serves meals for our events listed below and our hotel guests.

props.sectionThreeContent: Botë Farms Events include Transportation from Saranda, entrance to Eco-Pool, Animal Barn, and a delicious Meal from our Chef
